means: 学习，研究( study的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: She is currently doing a business studies course at Leeds.
sentence.Network_cn: 她目前在利兹大学修读一门商科课程。

sentence.Network_en: They'll have to give up completely on certain of their studies.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们将不得不彻底放弃某些研究。

sentence.Network_en: Two significant constants have been found in a number of research studies.
sentence.Network_cn: 若干研究已经发现了两个重要常量。

as CBS puts it : " In laboratory studies , women who sniff men's sweaty T-shirts find them more attractive when they come from men whose MHC genes don't match theirs . "CBS说：“根据实验室的研究结果，当女性在面对MHC基因与自己不匹配的男性时，她们会觉得这些男性散发着汗味的T恤闻起来更有吸引力。

entry.def: If you study, you spend time learning about a particular subject or subjects.

example.ex: ...a relaxed and happy atmosphere that will allow you to study to your full potential...
example.tran: 能让人充分发挥学习潜质的轻松愉快的环境

example.ex: He went to Hull University, where he studied History and Economics...
example.tran: 他去了赫尔大学学习历史和经济学。

entry.def: Study is the activity of studying.

example.ex: ...the use of maps and visual evidence in the study of local history...
example.tran: 利用地图和图像资料研究当地历史

example.ex: She gave up her studies to have Alexander.
example.tran: 为了生亚历山大，她放弃了学业。

entry.def: A study of a subject is a piece of research on it.

example.ex: Recent studies suggest that as many as 5 in 1000 new mothers are likely to have this problem.
example.tran: 最近的研究成果表明在 1000 个刚生产完的妈妈中，有 5 个可能存在这样的问题。

example.ex: ...the first study of English children's attitudes.
example.tran: 首个关于英国儿童观念的研究

entry.def: You can refer to educational subjects or courses that contain several elements as studies of a particular kind.

example.tran: 新的伊斯兰教研究中心

example.ex: She is currently doing a business studies course at Leeds.
example.tran: 她目前在利兹大学修读一门商科课程。

entry.def: If you study something, you look at it or watch it very carefully, in order to find something out.

example.ex: Debbie studied her friend's face for a moment.
example.tran: 黛比仔细端详了一会她朋友的脸。

entry.def: If you study something, you consider it or observe it carefully in order to be able to understand it fully.

example.ex: I know that you've been studying chimpanzees for thirty years now...
example.tran: 我知道你研究黑猩猩至今已有30年了。

example.ex: I invite every citizen to carefully study the document.
example.tran: 我请每位市民都仔细研读该文件。

entry.def: A study by an artist is a drawing which is done in preparation for a larger picture.
A study is a room in a house which is used for reading, writing, and studying.

auth_sentence.content: New studies of deaf signers hint at an answer.
auth_sentence.res_content: New studies of deaf signers hint at an answer.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: New studies of deaf signers hint at an answer.

auth_sentence.content: Jesse did some really good evolutionary studies on religiosity!
auth_sentence.res_content: Jesse did some really good evolutionary studies on religiosity!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jesse did some really good evolutionary studies on religiosity!

auth_sentence.content: He was told that animal studies were needed first.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was told that animal studies were needed first.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was told that animal studies were needed first.

Sentence.sentence: The research references studies of people's behavior with food and alcohol and results of alcohol restrictions, and then lists five regulations that the researchers think might be promising if applied to junk foods.
Studies have shown, for instance, that eating in front of the TV ( or a similar distraction) can increase both hunger and the amount of food consumed.
Several recent studies have found that being randomly (随机地) assigned to a roommate of another race can lead to increased tolerance but also to a greater likelihood (可能性)of conflict.
But numerous studies have now found that when classroom material is made harder to absorb, pupils retain more of it over the long term, and understand it on a deeper level.
Other studies have shown that saddling employees with unrealistic goals can compel them to lie, cheat or steal.
It may stimulate scientists to make further studies.
